property_description:
Renovated Penthouse with Spacious Terrace and Sea Views in La Duquesa – Style, Light and an Unbeatable Location

Discover this charming penthouse located in a quiet residential area of La Duquesa, ideal for those looking to combine quality of life, Mediterranean style and proximity to the sea. Set frontline to La Duquesa Golf Course, this home boasts absolutely privileged open views of the Mediterranean and the iconic Rock of Gibraltar, which can be enjoyed from a spectacular 27 m² private terrace.

The property, recently renovated, features 3 double bedrooms and 2 full bathrooms, functionally laid out over a built area of 90 m². The kitchen has been completely refurbished in a modern open-plan design that flows naturally into the living-dining area, providing a wonderful sense of spaciousness, comfort and light. The entire home is tastefully decorated with quality materials such as marble flooring, well-maintained woodwork and contemporary furnishings.

Currently, the terrace is accessed from the master bedroom, although there is the possibility of opening a direct exit from the living room for smoother access to the outside. The terrace becomes a true outdoor lounge – perfect for enjoying the mild Costa del Sol climate, reading with a sea view, or dining with friends at sunset.

Located in a well-established complex with landscaped gardens, an adult pool and a children's pool, this penthouse is perfect for families, couples or anyone seeking a peaceful seaside retreat with all the comforts. The area is very quiet, with a great community atmosphere – ideal for those seeking privacy and calm.

The location is another of its major highlights. Within less than 5 minutes by car you can reach the Marina of La Duquesa, the beaches of Manilva, and all kinds of services such as supermarkets, restaurants, schools and sports centres. Sotogrande is just 10 minutes away, Estepona 15 minutes, Gibraltar half an hour, and Málaga Airport just over an hour. A strategic location – perfect for enjoying the whole year or for weekend getaways.

A unique property, move-in ready, with great potential as either a main residence or a second home by the sea.

Come and visit – let yourself fall in love with its views, its light, and its welcoming atmosphere. We’re waiting for you!

property_description:
Discover the perfect blend of comfort and convenience in this delightful 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom apartment, ideally located in the vibrant heart of Fuengirola. Situated just a short stroll from the golden sands of the beach, this second-floor gem offers the quintessential Mediterranean lifestyle.

Step into a bright and airy living space bathed in natural light, courtesy of large windows that open onto a private balcony—perfect for enjoying your morning coffee or evening glass of wine while taking in the partial sea views. The open-plan kitchen adds a modern touch, seamlessly connecting to the living area for relaxed entertaining.

The spacious bedroom is designed for comfort and relaxation, while the fitted bathroom features a sleek walk-in shower and ample storage, combining functionality with style. A newly installed lift ensures easy access to your home, adding to the overall comfort.

Location is key, and this apartment truly excels. Just a short walk from the beach, you’ll find yourself in one of the most sought-after areas on the Costa del Sol. Whether you're spending the day by the sea, enjoying water sports, or simply taking a sunset stroll along the promenade, the Mediterranean lifestyle is right at your doorstep.

The apartment is also perfectly placed near an array of local amenities, including supermarkets, boutiques, bars, and restaurants. For those who love a lively social scene, Fuengirola offers a vibrant nightlife with beach clubs, cocktail bars, and music venues all within easy reach.

A particular highlight is the apartment’s proximity to Plaza de los Chinorros, one of Fuengirola’s most iconic squares. This traditional Spanish plaza is known for its authentic tapas bars, friendly ambiance, and bustling social atmosphere—an ideal place to unwind with friends and immerse yourself in local culture.

Fuengirola’s excellent transport links also mean you’re just a short train ride from Malaga Airport and other popular destinations like Marbella and Benalmádena, making this apartment an exceptional base for exploring the Costa del Sol.

Don’t miss the opportunity to own this delightful home in one of southern Spain’s most desirable coastal towns—where sun, sea, and culture meet in perfect harmony.

property_title: Ground Floor Apartment in La Cala
property_description:
Charming Ground-Floor Apartment with Sunny Terrace and Garden – Just Minutes from the Beach in La Cala de Mijas

Welcome to picturesque La Cala de Mijas – one of the most sought-after coastal gems on the Costa del Sol. This lively and charming neighbourhood blends the appeal of a traditional Andalusian village with all modern amenities right on your doorstep. The apartment is located in the popular Calazul complex, just a short stroll from the beautiful sandy beach, the scenic beachfront promenade, and the vibrant centre of La Cala. Here you'll find a wide range of restaurants, tapas bars, cafés, and shops – with a Lidl supermarket conveniently located right next to the complex. The area also offers green parks, quiet streets, and a friendly community atmosphere, ideal for both full-time living and holiday enjoyment.

Bright and Spacious Apartment with Garden, Partial Sea View, and Covered Terrace

This delightful ground-floor apartment offers a smart and functional layout with excellent natural light and direct access to the terrace and private garden from both the living room and bedroom. The interior living space measures 59 m² and the property has been well maintained since it was built in 2006. Upon entering, you'll find a separate kitchen to the left, equipped with a practical serving hatch to the living room – ideal for everyday living and entertaining. Next to the kitchen is a fully equipped bathroom. The spacious living room has clearly defined areas for both lounging and dining, and large sliding doors lead out to a generous 30 m² terrace with an 11 m² private garden – perfect for relaxing in the sun, enjoying breakfast outdoors, or sipping your afternoon coffee while overlooking the charming park right in front of the property.

The terrace is partially covered, providing both sunny and shaded areas throughout the day – ideal for year-round outdoor living, whether you're sunbathing or reading in the shade. From the terrace, there's even a glimpse of the sea – a lovely detail that enhances the outdoor experience.

The bedroom is spacious, with a built-in wardrobe and direct access to the terrace. The apartment is fitted with air conditioning (hot and cold) in both the living room and bedroom, and the system has recently been serviced to ensure optimal performance and comfort year-round. A private underground parking space and storage room are also included. The Calazul complex features well-maintained communal areas with lush gardens and inviting swimming pools that can be enjoyed most of the year.

Property Highlights:

Prime location in the heart of La Cala de Mijas

Just minutes’ walk from the beach and beachfront promenade

Lidl supermarket, restaurants, cafés, and shops right nearby

Quiet and friendly area with a lovely park directly in front of the apartment

Ground-floor apartment with private garden and spacious terrace

30 m² terrace – partially covered for both sun and shade

Partial sea view from the terrace

1 spacious bedroom with direct access to the terrace

1 fully equipped bathroom

Separate kitchen with serving hatch to the living room

Air conditioning (hot and cold) in living room and bedroom – recently serviced

Very good condition – built in 2006

Private storage room and underground parking included

Beautiful communal gardens and swimming pool

A perfect property for those looking to live close to the beach and town centre in a popular and well-maintained development – ideal as a permanent home, holiday apartment, or rental investment.

With modern amenities and the potential for additional loft space, this property is perfect for those seeking a blend of contemporary design and practical functionality.

About the Carranque Area

Located next to El Corte Inglés in Malaga's historic center, Carranque is a vibrant neighborhood that combines the charm of Malaga residential neighborhood with modern conveniences. This area is well-connected, with easy access to the metro, making commuting a breeze. Being close to hospitals and shopping centers, including the renowned El Corte Inglés, residents enjoy a wealth of amenities right at their doorstep. The neighborhood is ideal for those who appreciate the convenience of urban living while being surrounded by Malaga's rich cultural heritage and vibrant community life.

Second Line from the Beach in a World Class Resort!

At the end of the hallway we find the master bedroom with a large double bed and the large sliding doors giving access to the main terrace and letting light in all day long.

This apartment is a gem in a quiet area, where you can enjoy life in Marbella without sacrificing proximity to all the services you need. Don’t miss the opportunity to make this place your new home!

property_description:
We offer this magnificent studio for sale in the coastal town of Marbella, in the Elviria area. Located on the second floor within the Playa Romana complex, this beachfront property offers communal parking, 5 communal pools, a restaurant, and a children's playground, with direct access to the beach.

It is being sold fully furnished and has a Tourist License (currently yielding an 8% net return).

It has a surface area of ​​40 m², comprising a bathroom with a bathtub and a spacious living-dining room, kitchen, and bedroom with a built-in wardrobe, plus a 12 m² terrace from which to enjoy the beautiful climate of the Costa del Sol and views of the Mediterranean Sea and the resort.

Located in a very exclusive and private development of this highly valued tourist destination, a 20-minute drive from the center of Marbella and the popular Puerto Banús, very close to the best beaches in the area and the luxurious Marriott's Marbella Beach Resort or the Hotel Vincci Selección Estrella del Mar, in the Jardín de las Golondrinas district, a highly sought-after tourist destination. In addition to being able to relax in the tranquility of the area, it is also within easy reach of all the services and facilities you could need for your enjoyment, both in terms of supplies (with Carrefour supermarkets nearby) and leisure and cultural opportunities, with the Santa María Golf Club Marbella just a 4-minute drive away.

It has excellent public transport links (bus lines L-302, M-220, M-320, and line 6) and easy road access to the A-7 (500m from the Mediterranean motorway).

A home for those who want to live in a quiet, well-connected area, as well as for those looking to invest in rental properties with excellent returns.

Want to know more?

property_title: Middle Floor Apartment in La Duquesa
property_description:
This exceptional one-bedroom apartment is situated in the sought-after urbanisation Marina La Duquesa, offering a prime front line beach location.

The apartment comprises a spacious interior of 50m², complemented by an 8m² private terrace and a balcony, providing delightful garden and pool views.
It has undergone a complete renovation, including all electrical and plumbing installations. The walls have been plastered, and the kitchen has been integrated into the living room. All switches and sockets are made of new-generation glass. The blinds are automated and remote-controlled. High-end appliances and electronics (washing machine, refrigerator, dishwasher, induction cooktop, oven, refrigerator). The furniture and decorations are also high-quality. The kitchen has been designed for convenient use. The air conditioning is internal. The intercom can be opened via an app, and the door can be opened with a key or code.
The apartment includes an underground private parking space.

Currently, the entire building facade is being renovated. The urbanization has four swimming pools, including one with a sea view and lifeguards at each pool. There is a gym, paddle tennis table, ping-pong table, and a space for group meetings. Security is available 24/7 and accepts packages sent by courier.

The apartment is located on the beach front line. It is located 50 meters from the port but away from the noise of the local Clubs and restaurants. In the port you will find all facilities restaurants, cafes, and clubs. Port de la Duquesa offers many amenities, including:
A supermarket open 7 days a week, a pharmacy, hair and beauty salons, a dry cleaner, a seamstress, a butcher, etc.

The apartment comes fully furnished, with all decorations and household appliances included in the price.

This state of the art renovated apartment is ideally suited for those seeking a modern, secure, luxurious and convenient lifestyle by the sea. With its combination of high-quality finishes, excellent communal amenities, and an unbeatable beachfront location, it represents a unique opportunity in the heart of Marina Duquesa.

One of its standout features is the large terrace — the perfect space to relax, soak up the sun, or enjoy al fresco dining year-round, thanks to the area's wonderful Mediterranean climate.

Inside, the apartment offers a generous living-dining area, ideal for family gatherings or entertaining guests. Both bedrooms are spacious and bright, with built-in wardrobes that maximize storage. The independent kitchen is both functional and practical, featuring a separate utility area for added convenience.

The two full bathrooms are elegantly finished in marble, and the property comes equipped with ducted air conditioning, ensuring comfort throughout all seasons.

Set within a beautiful residential complex, residents can enjoy a large communal swimming pool, expansive landscaped gardens, and well-kept shared spaces — perfect for embracing the laid-back lifestyle of the Costa del Sol.

Ideally located just minutes from top golf courses such as El Paraíso Golf Club, Atalaya Golf, and Guadalmina Golf, and only 10 km from Puerto Banús, 5 km from San Pedro de Alcántara, and 15 km from Marbella’s historic centre. property_description:
Duplex Penthouse in Bahía de Casares, Costa del Sol – Stunning Sea and Mountain Views

This stunning duplex penthouse, in excellent condition, is located in one of the most sought-after areas of the Costa del Sol, in Casares. With a perfect layout, it offers 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms, ideal for those looking for a spacious, bright home with breathtaking views of the sea and mountains.

On the second floor, the property features a cozy living room with a sofa bed, a dining table, and direct access to a large private terrace. Here, you can enjoy outdoor moments with panoramic views that combine the blue of the sea and the majesty of the mountains. The second floor also includes two bedrooms, one with two single beds and the other with a single bed, both equipped with fitted wardrobes for added convenience. This level also includes a full bathroom with a bathtub.

The third floor hosts the master suite, a spacious room with a comfortable king-size bed and an en-suite bathroom with a shower. From the suite, you have access to another private terrace with sun loungers, a perfect spot to relax and enjoy the sun.

The property is part of a gated community, providing enhanced security and peace of mind. Residents can enjoy two communal swimming pools, surrounded by sunshades and loungers—ideal for cooling off during the warm summer days. The communal garden is also a pleasant space to enjoy the outdoors.

In terms of location, the property is just 7 minutes on foot from Playa Chica and 500 meters from two excellent restaurants: Bahía de Casares and La Sal. The Lidl supermarket is only 2 km away, while the lively areas of Sabanillas, Puerto de la Duquesa, and Estepona are within 2 to 8 km, offering both tranquility and easy access to local amenities and entertainment..

**For Sale: Stunning Penthouse with Breathtaking Views in the Heart of Alhaurín el Grande**

Are you looking for an exclusive home that combines comfort, luxury, and a prime location? This beautiful penthouse offers everything you could desire: fantastic views, a modern finish, and ample space to enjoy life in style.

**Features of this dream apartment:**

- **Breathtaking Views:** Enjoy panoramic views over the mountains and valley, a stunning sight that will captivate you every day. It's like nature is your next-door neighbor!

- **Spacious Terraces:** Two large terraces provide plenty of room for relaxation and socializing. One of them is even enclosed, making it a perfect extension of the living room – ideal for hosting guests or simply enjoying the outdoors, no matter the season.

- **New, Modern Kitchen:** The apartment features a beautiful, newly installed kitchen that is perfect for preparing delicious meals, whether for yourself or for entertaining.

- **Communal Pool:** Need to cool off on a warm summer day? The communal pool is the perfect place to unwind and relax.

- **Luxury Amenities:** The home is equipped with a lift, a private parking spot, and two storage rooms, offering convenience and plenty of space to store your belongings.

- **In Perfect Condition:** This penthouse is in excellent condition, ready to move in. No need to worry about renovations or maintenance – everything is meticulously cared for.

- **Prime Location:** Situated in the charming center of Alhaurín el Grande, with everything within walking distance. Shops, restaurants, and cafes are just a stroll away, while you can still enjoy the tranquility and breathtaking views.

This penthouse is not just a home; it’s a lifestyle. A place where you can enjoy life at your own pace, with space for relaxation, social moments, and, of course, to admire the stunning natural surroundings.

Are you ready to discover your dream home? Contact us for more information or to schedule a viewing.

**Don’t wait too long – an opportunity like this doesn’t come around often!**

property_description:
Bright 2-Bed Corner Apartment in Miraflores

A bright and spacious 2-bedroom, 2-bathroom corner apartment in the sought-after Albamar complex in Miraflores, Mijas Costa. Offering a prime west-facing terrace perfect for afternoon sun, this apartment benefits from stunning communal gardens, three swimming pools, a children's pool, and an on-site bar and restaurant open seasonally. Just a 10-minute walk to Miraflores beach with Antonio's popular chiringuito restaurant as well as a range of local amenities including supermarkets, restaurants, and bars right on your doorstep.

The property features a wide lounge with an aspect window that brings in plenty of natural light. The fully furnished apartment includes two renovated bathrooms and two spacious bedrooms, both with fitted wardrobes. The master bedroom comes complete with an en-suite bathroom, while the kitchen features a convenient serving hatch to the lounge and a separate utility room. With air conditioning and fibre optic internet, this property offers everything needed for comfortable living or a profitable rental investment.

Additional highlights include a proven short-term rental history, making it an excellent option for investors seeking immediate returns.

Summary:
2-bedroom, 2-bathroom corner apartment in Albamar, Miraflores
West-facing terrace with afternoon sun and garden views
Three communal pools, children's pool, and seasonal on-site bar/restaurant
Renovated bathrooms and fully equipped kitchen with utility room
Bright lounge with aspect window and terrace access
Air conditioning, fibre optic internet, and fully furnished
Proven short-term rental history for immediate investment returns
10-minute walk to Miraflores beach, chiringuito, supermarket, restaurants, and bars

property_description:
Charming One-Bedroom Penthouse with Panoramic Views in Elviria, Marbella

This fully independent one-bedroom penthouse, located in the tranquil hills of Elviria, Marbella, offers stunning panoramic views of the sea, mountains, and golf course. From the kitchen to the spacious terrace, every corner invites you to relax and soak in the sun, with total privacy and peace. Whether you're looking for the perfect holiday escape or a serene place to live year-round, this penthouse has it all.

The apartment features a minimalist and comfortable design. It includes a full bathroom with both a shower and bathtub. The separate kitchen not only maximizes space in each area but also offers the opportunity to customize it and make it feel like home from day one. The generous bedroom has ample room to organize your belongings, and the living area easily accommodates a sofa and a dining table for four.

Regardless of the season, your comfort is guaranteed with central air conditioning and heating. An instantaneous electronic water heater provides hot water on demand, perfect for a warm bath any time of day. The building also offers high-speed fiber optic internet—ideal for remote work or streaming without interruptions.

The large terrace is perfect for outdoor living: dine alfresco, sip your morning coffee, enjoy a glass of wine or cocktail, relax in a hammock, or even nap under the sun thanks to the versatile outdoor furniture.

Access to the penthouse is seamless, with a lift that takes you directly from the underground garage to your front door. As the only apartment on the top floor, you’ll enjoy unmatched privacy. The property is sold with a spacious underground parking space and a storage room for your convenience.

Set in a well-maintained urbanisation surrounded by lush gardens and mature trees, the complex features three communal swimming pools—the largest of which is directly in front of the apartment and visible from the kitchen.

The beach and local amenities are just a 5-minute drive away. Elviria offers a wide range of restaurants, cafés, and shops, catering to all tastes and budgets. The nearby Commercial Centre includes supermarkets, pharmacies, bars, car rentals, and more. It’s easily accessible—just a 4-minute drive or a pleasant 15–20-minute walk downhill. Public transport is also available, with permanent taxi stands and bus stops in the same area.

Elviria is ideally located just 10 km from Marbella’s city center and La Cañada shopping mall, and 15 km from Puerto Banús. Golf lovers will appreciate that the Santa María Golf Course is only a 5-minute drive away, with many more golf courses spread throughout the Costa del Sol.

property_description:
Fuengirola center, Costa del Sol-
New 2 bedroom 2 bathroom apartment with panoramic views in the centre of Fuengirola, within walking distance to a wide range of amenities including the beach (10 min walk).
The apartment feature open plan kitchens (fully fitted) 2 bedrooms with built-in wardrobes, bathrooms have walk-in showers with fitted glass screens. To keep the look modern the terraces have a glass fence.

In regards to sustainability, the building has solar panels to reduce as much as possible the use of electricity for heating water.

The newest residential city building in a pleasant & established central area of Fuengirola town. These 37 modern 1 to 3 bedroom apartments are built across 6 floors with the bonus of a large underground parking. Each floor is serviced by a lift. The apartments on the two top floors facing south have partial sea views whilst the apartments facing north enjoy a vista towards the Costa del Sol's impressive mountain range. Community fees are expected to be low.

Fully fitted kitchens & bathrooms
Pre installation of air conditioning,
Pictures displaying furniture are just renders, the properties are sold unfurnished.

A FABULOUS LOCATION...

This development is located in the heart of Fuengirola next to Bioparc (zoo). The water park is nearby and the area is further complemented by the convenience of a range of shops and restaurants. Within an easy 12 minute walk you will find Fuengirola's golden beaches, it's wonderful promenade and interesting network of streets to explore. So, from day one you can immerse yourself in the vibrant, yet, laid back lifestyle and discover why Fuengirola is so popular with international visitors who enjoy the temperate climate and all that this prime area of coast has to offer. 

Fuengirola is conveniently situated on the Costa del Sol halfway between Malaga and Marbella. It has close proximity to Malaga airport which is serviced by a coastal train line to Fuengirola, bus routes and good road networks. 

Once a sleepy fishing village, Fuengirola has blossomed into one of the regions leading resorts with it's own marina and an array of local attractions including the prominent Sohail Castle, Bioparc and Mijas Aquapark. Fuengirola still retains Spanish charm with its array of stylish tapas bars, bodegas, and wide range of shops especially in the popular Plaza Constitucion (church square) area. The Miramar shopping center, on its outskirts, offers further shopping, cinemas and fast food dining experiences.  

The glamorous Marbella and Puerto Bands are just 20 minutes drive away. The nearest golf courses are Cerrado del Aguila, El Chaparral and Mijas Golf, although, there is a plethora of alternative championship courses with a 10 minute drive.

It is easy to see how Fuengirola has become a favorite destination with its easy access, golden beaches, marina and Paseo Maritime offering a range of chiringuitos (beach restaurants and casual dining) where either a leisurely lunch or an evening meal at sunset can be enjoyed. Fuengirola will not disappoint.

property_description:
A seaside outlook, a village heartbeat – welcome to Santa Ana, Mijas Pueblo

Tucked away in , a friendly, low-rise development just a leisurely stroll from the white-washed lanes of El Barrio, this ground-floor apartment delivers that rare blend of village atmosphere and sweeping Mediterranean views.

Walk through the wrought-iron gate from the residents’ pool terrace and you step straight into a semi-covered outdoor sitting room – the spot for lazy breakfasts or a cool drink after a swim. A convenient guest cloakroom is tucked to one side, while a private doorway leads directly into the first double bedroom, perfect for friends who like an early dip.

A short inner hall draws you past ample storage to the second double bedroom and a newly refurbished shower room, finished with a frameless walk-in enclosure and contemporary tiling.

Suddenly the corridor opens up and the sea appears. The kitchen, dining and sitting areas flow as one light-filled space, so the cook can chat with guests without losing sight of the blue horizon beyond the patio doors. Stone-effect worktops, full-height cabinets and a breakfast bar keep the kitchen smart and practical, while split-unit air-conditioning, a ceiling fan and a modern pellet stove ensure year-round comfort. Fibre broadband and a satellite-ready TV point are already in place.

Slide the doors aside and the sitting room spills onto a south-facing terrace big enough for sunset suppers or morning yoga. On a clear day you can trace the coastline all the way to Málaga, with the hillsides of the Costa del Sol rolling beneath you.

At a glance
Two double bedrooms plus guest cloakroom

Stylish walk-in shower room

Direct access to the communal pool and to two private terraces

Open-plan living with uninterrupted sea views

Fibre broadband, air-conditioning and pellet stove

Quiet Santa Ana cul-de-sac, 5 minutes on foot to El Barrio’s cafés, craft shops and the iconic Mijas Pueblo viewpoint

Keys in hand, village tapas around the corner, the Mediterranean sparkling in front of you – your Andalusian home is ready.

property_title: Middle Floor Apartment in Riviera del Sol
property_description:
Spacious 3-Bedroom Apartment with Sea Views in Urb. Los Olivos, Riviera del Sol
Nestled in the tranquil and well-maintained urbanization of Los Olivos in Riviera del Sol, this stunning 3-bedroom, 2-bathroom apartment offers the perfect blend of space, comfort, and coastal charm. Set within a secure, gated community, the property is ideal for those seeking a peaceful Mediterranean lifestyle without compromising on convenience or accessibility.
With a generous and thoughtfully designed layout, this apartment welcomes you with a bright, airy living and dining area, filled with natural light thanks to sliding glass doors that lead directly onto a private terrace. From here, you are treated to spectacular views of the Mediterranean Sea, making it the perfect place to relax, entertain, or dine al fresco while enjoying the serene coastal backdrop.
The master bedroom complete with ample wardrobe space and en-suite bathroom has direct access to the terrace, allowing you to wake up to sea views each morning. The two additional bedrooms are spacious, both featuring built-in wardrobes and windows that fills the rooms with light. A well-appointed second bathroom serves these bedrooms, offering comfort and privacy for family or guests.
The kitchen is fully fitted and equipped with quality appliances, generous storage space, and a practical layout that makes meal preparation both efficient and enjoyable.
Residents of Los Olivos enjoy access to beautifully landscaped communal gardens, a large swimming pool, and a second pool with plenty of sunbathing areas — all maintained to an excellent standard. The community itself is peaceful, secure, and well-regarded, with a friendly and welcoming atmosphere.
Additional features of the property include: Air conditioning (hot and cold) throughout, High-speed internet service, communal parking, Elevator access to all floors.
Located just a few minutes' drive from sandy beaches, shops, restaurants, and world-class golf courses, this apartment is ideally situated for both relaxation and activity. Whether you are looking for a permanent residence, a holiday escape, or a smart rental investment, this exceptional home in Riviera del Sol ticks all the boxes.
Don’t miss the opportunity to enjoy coastal living at its finest—this property truly needs to be seen to be fully appreciated.

property_description:
This beautifully maintained two-bedroom, two-bathroom raised garden apartment boasts open, panoramic views across protected green zones, the Mediterranean Sea, and the surrounding mountains. Located in the prestigious La Mairena area above Elviria—an area of exceptional natural beauty recognized by UNESCO—this home offers a rare combination of peace, privacy, and convenient access to the coast.

The apartment features a bright and spacious layout, with a generous living area that opens onto a large terrace where you can relax and enjoy the uninterrupted scenery. A second terrace at the rear captures the afternoon sun, offering a tranquil and private outdoor space. The kitchen is fully equipped and includes a separate laundry room. Both bedrooms are well-sized with ample built-in wardrobes, and the master includes an en-suite bathroom. Cream marble floors, stylish marble bathrooms, electric blinds, hot and cold air conditioning, and an intelligent home system add to the refined finish of the property.

Residents benefit from a wide range of exclusive amenities including beautifully landscaped gardens, a large swimming pool, gym, spa, tennis and paddle courts, and a private 9-hole golf course—all free for residents to enjoy. A welcoming clubhouse with a bar and restaurant is just a short walk away.

The property includes a private underground garage space and a storage room. Marbella is just 15 minutes away by car, Puerto Banús 20 minutes, and Málaga Airport only 30 minutes. Beaches, shops, and everyday conveniences are all within an 8-minute drive.

property_description:
Great investment opportunity with excellent price in Marbella Centro!

We present this bright semi-furnished apartment, located in a privileged area in the center of Marbella, ideal for both investment and residential use due to its proximity to all urban amenities. The property has a spacious bedroom with fitted closets and en suite bathroom complete with bidet. Its living room, spacious and cozy, has a traditional fireplace and marble floors, bringing elegance and comfort to the environment.

The independent kitchen is equipped with oven, dishwasher, microwave and washing machine, appliances included in the price. From the living room and the bedroom there is access to a balcony with pleasant views of a quiet wooded area.

It should be noted that the property is offered semi-furnished, including sofa, basic furniture and appliances, allowing immediate habitability with the flexibility to adapt the style to your personal preference.

THE AREA IN DETAIL : MARBELLA CENTRO ⤵️

Marbella Centro is one of the most dynamic and sought after areas of the Costa del Sol, famous for its cosmopolitan lifestyle and variety of services. The apartment is located on the emblematic Jacinto Benavente street, just steps away from the historic center of Marbella, known for the charming Plaza de los Naranjos, prestigious restaurants, boutique stores and picturesque streets.

Its privileged location allows easy access to the promenade and golden beaches of Marbella in a few minutes walk, in addition to excellent public transport, supermarkets and shopping centers nearby. The proximity to international schools and essential services makes this location ideal for all types of profiles, from young couples to investors interested in high tourist profitability.

THE APARTMENT IN DETAIL ⤵️

Upon entering the apartment, we are greeted by a spacious, bright and functional space, where the living room with fireplace and separate kitchen create a cozy atmosphere. The fully equipped kitchen has all the necessary appliances for day to day life.

The bedroom, with built-in closets and direct access to the balcony, offers privacy and tranquility. The bathroom, complete and equipped with bidet, perfectly complements the comfort needs of this house.

On the side of the apartment, there is another east-facing terrace, which includes a spacious storage room.
The owners have an approved project to create three parking spaces in front of the building, pending approval from the community.
Only 30 minutes to Malaga international airport.
